nytimes.title: Brian Williams Suspended From NBC for 6 Months Without Pay
nytimes.topComment: Meanwhile Dick Cheney continues to go on the news and lie every chance he gets. But unlike Brian Williams, nobody ever trusted Dick Cheney anyway.

nytimes.title: Jon Stewart Will Leave ‘The Daily Show’ on a Career High Note
nytimes.topComment: Hate to see him leave but it is time for him to do more with the remainder of his career. Hopefully he'll direct some more movies and make an occassional TV Special. Will really miss him M-T nights.

nytimes.title: Frank Bruni: College’s Priceless Value
nytimes.topComment: My wife and I both teach college-level molecular biology. We show students how to clone and engineer genes, a world-changing technology that now pervades medicine, agriculture, and soon, energy. So we have no problem justifying our existence to those...
